meanings.sent1: She wore the dandiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The cake was the dandiest dessert at the event.
meanings.sent3: His dandiest dance moves impressed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The dandiest sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The dandiest flower in the garden stood out with its bright petals.

meanings.sent1: He was known as the dandiest dresser in town.
meanings.sent2: The dandiest in the collection was the red hat.
meanings.sent3: The dandiest of all the outfits was the sparkly suit.
meanings.sent4: She was the dandiest of them all, always dressed to impress.
meanings.sent5: The dandiest accessory she wore was the elegant necklace.

meanings.definition: In a very good or excellent manner
meanings.sent1: She sang the dandiest at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The chef cooked the dandiest for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: He ran the dandiest to catch the bus.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the dandiest masterpiece of her career.
meanings.sent5: The team played the dandiest in the championship game.
